attributes.action: Police effectively without criminalising soft targets like motorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Police should prioritise their policing to ensure the safety of the general public. Instead they target easy petty offenders like motorists who they know can pay fines. Instead of criminalising motorists they should be making towns safe so law abiding people are not in fear of mobs of youths or gangs. There should NOT be ANY "no-go" areas in UK
